string-array.name: description_array
string-array.item: Volvo Car Corporation is a Swedish premium automobile manufacturer, headquartered in the VAK building in Gothenburg.
The Mini is a small economy car made by the British Motor Corporation (BMC) and its successors from 1959 until 2000. The original is considered a British icon of the 1960s.
Volkswagen is a German car manufacturer headquartered in Wolfsburg, Lower Saxony, Germany.
